text: Ridiculous. Who would have predicted California would declare war on skaters AND surfers? Message to Big Government Dems:  You can protect public safety & have reasonable social distancing WITHOUT trampling on individual Liberty & shutting down the outdoors. https://t.co/VOBkXXBuhl
